PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-04282014-04-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  DFATD
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAmendments to Annex IX of the Basel Convention on the Control of Transboundary Movements of Hazardous Waste and their Disposal ** CONVENTION **
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to accept, on behalf of Canada, that Amendments to Annex IX of the BASEL CONVENTION ON THE CONTROL OF TRANSBOUNDARY MOVEMENTS OF HAZARDOUS WASTE AND THEIR DISPOSAL, adopted in Geneva from 28 April to 10 May 2013, be binding on Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
